## Bio

Luis Terrazas-Salgado is a PhD candidate and studies the effects of xenobiotics on embryonic and reproductive development in zebrafish at the Centro de Investigacion en Alimentación y Desarrollo A.C. in Mazatlán, Sinaloa, Mexico.
My research uses a zebrafish models, to characterize molecular mechanisms underpinning potential impacts of xenobiotics on human and animal health.
